item.title: 〔高中生程式解題系統〕a021: 大數運算
item.description:
題目：http://zerojudge.tw/ShowProblem?problemid=a021
Java： 
/**********************************************************************************/
/*  Problem: a021 "大數運算"                                                  */
/*  Language: JAVA                                                                */
/*  Result: AC (112ms, 5552KB) on ZeroJudge                                       */
/*  Author: mushiyo at 2011-07-03 14:52:50                                        */
/**********************************************************************************/


import java.math.BigInteger;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class a021 {

 public static void main(String[] args) {
  Scanner input = new Scanner(System.in);

  while (input.hasNext()) {
   BigInteger operand1 = new BigInteger(input.next());
   char operator = input.next().charAt(0);
   BigInteger operand2 = new BigInteger(input.next());

   switch (operator) {
   case '+':
    System.out.println(operand1.add(operand2));
    break;
   case '-':
    System.out.println(operand1.add(operand2.negate()));
    break;
   case '*':
    System.out.println(operand1.multiply(operand2));
    break;
   default:
    System.out.println(operand1.divide(operand2));
    break;

   }

  }
 }

}

item.description:
題目：http://zerojudge.tw/ShowProblem?problemid=a020
Java： 
/**********************************************************************************/
/*  Problem: a020 "身分證檢驗"                                               */
/*  Language: JAVA                                                                */
/*  Result: AC (112ms, 5332KB) on ZeroJudge                                       */
/*  Author: mushiyo at 2011-06-30 22:43:28                                        */
/**********************************************************************************/


import java.util.Scanner;

public class a020 {

 public static void main(String[] args) {
  Scanner input = new Scanner(System.in);
  int[] correspondNum = { 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 34, 18, 19, 20,
    21, 22, 35, 23, 24, 25, 26, 27, 28, 29, 32, 30, 31, 33 };
  
  while(input.hasNext()){
   String ID = input.next();
   char initialChar = ID.charAt(0);
   int[] IDNum = new int[9];
   
   for(int i = 0; i < IDNum.length; ++i){
    IDNum[i] = Character.getNumericValue(ID.charAt(i + 1));
   }
   
   int checkCode = (correspondNum[initialChar - 'A'] / 10) + (correspondNum[initialChar - 'A'] % 10) * 9;
   for(int i = 0; i < IDNum.length - 1; ++i){
    checkCode += IDNum[i] * (8 - i);
   }
   checkCode += IDNum[IDNum.length - 1];
   
   if(checkCode % 10 != 0){
    System.out.println("fake");
   }
   else{
    System.out.println("real");
   }
  }

 }

}

item.description:

Java： 
/**********************************************************************************/
/*  Problem: a011 "幼稚園的算數遊戲" from ACM 494                         */
/*  Language: JAVA                                                                */
/*  Result: AC (116ms, 5488KB) on ZeroJudge                                       */
/*  Author: mushiyo at 2011-05-09 23:15:20                                        */
/**********************************************************************************/


import java.util.Scanner;

public class a011 {

 public static void main(String[] args) {
  Scanner input = new Scanner(System.in);
  
  while(input.hasNext()){
   String s = input.nextLine();
   int count = 0;
   
   for(int i = 0; i < s.length() - 1; ++i){
    if(!Character.isLetter(s.charAt(i+1))){
     if(Character.isLetter(s.charAt(i))){
      ++count;     
     }
    }
   }
   
   if(Character.isLetter(s.charAt(s.length() - 1))){
    if(Character.isLetter(s.charAt(s.length() - 2))){
     ++count;
    }
   }
   
   if(!Character.isLetter(s.charAt(s.length() - 2))){
    if(Character.isLetter(s.charAt(s.length() - 1))){
     ++count;
    }
   }
   
   System.out.println(count);
  }
 }

}

item.description:

Java： 
/**********************************************************************************/
/*  Problem: a007 "判斷質數"                                                  */
/*  Language: JAVA                                                                */
/*  Result: AC (120ms, 5672KB) on ZeroJudge                                       */
/*  Author: mushiyo at 2011-04-30 12:29:29                                        */
/**********************************************************************************/


import java.util.Scanner;

public class a007 {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Scanner input = new Scanner(System.in);
  
        while (input.hasNext()) {
            int checkNum = input.nextInt();
            int i = 2;

            for (i = 2; i <= Math.sqrt(checkNum); ++i) {
                if ((checkNum % i) != 0) {
                    continue;
                }
                else {
                    System.out.println("非質數");
                    break;
            }
       }

            if (i > Math.sqrt(checkNum)) {
                System.out.println("質數");
            }
       }

    }

}

item.title: 〔高中生程式解題系統〕a006: 一元二次方程式
item.description:
題目：http://zerojudge.tw/ShowProblem?problemid=a006
Ｃ： 
/**********************************************************************************/
/*  Problem: a006 "一元二次方程式"                                         */
/*  Language: C                                                                   */
/*  Result: AC (3ms, 304KB) on ZeroJudge                                          */
/*  Author: mushiyo at 2010-10-24 21:52:26                                        */
/**********************************************************************************/


#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>

int main(){
    double a, b, c;
    double d;
    double x1, x2;
    
    while(scanf("%lf %lf %lf", &a, &b, &c) == 3){
        d = b * b - 4 * a * c;

        if(d == 0){
            x1 = (- b) / (2 * a);
            if(x1 == -0){
                x1 = 0;
            }
            printf("Two same roots x=%.0lf\n", x1);
        }
        else if(d < 0){
            printf("No real root\n");
        }
        else{
            x1 = (- b + sqrt(d)) / (2 * a);
            x2 = (- b - sqrt(d)) / (2 * a);
            printf("Two different roots x1=%.0lf , x2=%.0lf\n", x1, x2); 
        }
    }

    return 0;
}
item.author: Mushiyo

item.title: 〔高中生程式解題系統〕a005: Eva 的回家作業
item.description:
題目：http://zerojudge.tw/ShowProblem?problemid=a005
Ｃ： 
/**********************************************************************************/
/*  Problem: a005 "Eva 的回家作業" from POJ                                  */
/*  Language: C                                                                   */
/*  Result: AC (2ms, 264KB) on ZeroJudge                                          */
/*  Author: mushiyo at 2010-10-22 20:09:31                                        */
/**********************************************************************************/


#include <stdio.h>

int main(){
    int num;
    int a,b,c,d;

    while(scanf("%d", &num) == 1){
        while(scanf("%d %d %d %d",&a,&b,&c,&d)==4){
            printf("%d %d %d %d ",a,b,c,d);
            if( (b - a) == (c - b)){
                printf("%d\n", d + ( b - a) );
            }
            else{
                printf("%d\n", d * (b / a));
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}

item.title: 〔高中生程式解題系統〕a004: 文文的求婚
item.description:
題目：http://zerojudge.tw/ShowProblem?problemid=a004
Ｃ： 
/**********************************************************************************/
/*  Problem: a004 "文文的求婚"                                               */
/*  Language: C                                                                   */
/*  Result: AC (4ms, 242KB) on ZeroJudge                                          */
/*  Author: mushiyo at 2010-02-08 15:04:14                                        */
/**********************************************************************************/


#include <stdio.h>

int main(){
    int year;
    while(scanf("%d",&year)==1){
        if( !(year % 4) && year % 100 || !(year % 400)){
            printf("閏年\n");
        }
        else{
            printf("平年\n");
        }
    }

    return 0;
}

item.title: 〔大學生程式解題系統〕d148: The 3n + 1 problem
item.description:
題目：http://judge.nccucs.org/ShowProblem?problemid=d148

Ｃ： 
#include <stdio.h>


int main(){
    int i, j, k;
    int count;
    int maxLength = 1, currentLength = 1;

    while(scanf("%d%d", &i, &j) == 2){

        printf("%d %d", i, j);
        k = i;
        if(i > j){
            k = j;
            j = i;
            i = k;
        }

        for(count = i; count <= j; count++, i++){
            while(k != 1){
                if(k % 2){
                    k = 3 * k + 1;
                }
                else{
                    k /= 2;
                }
                currentLength ++;
            }
            k = i + 1;

            if (maxLength < currentLength){
                maxLength = currentLength;
            }
            currentLength = 1;
        }
        printf(" %d\n", maxLength);
        maxLength = 1;
    }

    return 0;

}

item.title: 〔高中生程式解題系統〕a003: 兩光法師占卜術
item.description:
題目：http://zerojudge.tw/ShowProblem?problemid=a003
Ｃ：

/**********************************************************************************/
/*  Problem: a003 "兩光法師占卜術"                                         */
/*  Language: C                                                                   */
/*  Result: AC (4ms, 232KB) on ZeroJudge                                          */
/*  Author: mushiyo at 2010-02-08 13:36:30                                        */
/**********************************************************************************/


#include <stdio.h>

int main(){
    int M,D,S;

    while(scanf("%d%d",&M,&D)==2){
        S=(M*2+D)%3 ;
        if(S==2){
            printf("大吉\n");
        }
        else if(S==1){
            printf("吉\n");
        }
        else{
            printf("普通\n");
        }
    }
    return 0;
}

item.title: 〔大學生程式解題系統〕d012: 迴文
item.description:
題目：http://judge.nccucs.org/ShowProblem?problemid=d012

Ｃ＋＋：
#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

bool isPalindrome(string s);

int main()
{
    string str;
    while(cin >> str){
        if(isPalindrome(str)){
            cout << "Yes\n";
        }
        else{
            cout << "No\n";
        }
    }
    return 0;
}

bool isPalindrome(string s)
{
    int length = s.length();
    
    
    if (length == 1){
        return true;
    }
    else if(length == 2){
        if(s.at(0) == s.at(1)){
            return true;
        }
        else{
            return false;
        }
    }
    else if(s.at(0) == s.at(length - 1)){
        s = s.substr (1,length - 2);
        return isPalindrome(s);
    }
    else{
        return false;
    }
        
}
